title: Conflict Arbitrator - AI-Powered Mediation Overlay
problem: People struggle to resolve conflicts fairly and privately. Traditional mediation is expensive, requires scheduling, and may not be accessible. Couples, business partners, parents/teens, and friends need a neutral, empathetic mediator available instantly.
user: Anyone in conflict: couples, business partners, parents/teens, friends, pre-court parties
solution: An overlay-based AI mediator that works on any platform (Zoom, FaceTime, WhatsApp) to provide real-time, fair conflict resolution using multi-model consensus. Local-first for privacy, works instantly, costs a fraction of human mediation.
differentiator: 1) Overlay works anywhere (no app switching), 2) Multi-model consensus ensures fairness, 3) Local-first privacy (sensitive conflicts stay private), 4) Instant access (no scheduling), 5) Affordable (free tier + $29/month premium)
target_users: Couples, business partners, parents/teens, friends, legal parties
implementation_phases: Phase 1: MVP - Basic two-party mediation (4-6 weeks)
Phase 2: Enhanced - Multi-model consensus, bias detection (4-6 weeks)
Phase 3: Advanced - Multiple conflict types, tracking (6-8 weeks)
Phase 4: Professional - Legal docs, multi-party (8-10 weeks)
